newsitem.title: EU: Official Journal contents - OJ C 237 of August 4, 1997.
newsitem.headline: Official Journal contents - OJ C 237 of August 4, 1997.

text.p: Common position (EC) No 28/97 of 17 June 1997 adopted by the Council, acting in accordance with the procedure referred to in Article 189b of the Treaty establishing the European Community, with a view to adopting a European Parliament and Council Directive on the legal protection of designs

Common position (EC) No 29/97 of 17 June 1997 adopted by the Council, acting in accordance with the procedure referred to in Article 189b of the Treaty establishing the European Community, with a view to adopting a European Parliament and Council Directive amending Directives 76/116/EEC, 80/876/EEC, 89/284/EEC and 89/530/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to fertilizers END OF DOCUMENT.
